hits.Title: Vega Mix 2: Mystery of Island
hits.Description: Welcome to Match-3 - an exciting three in a row adventure set on a mysterious island! Join two brave girls as they embark on a quest to save Alice's beloved husband from an ancient idol. Challenge yourself with tricky puzzles and puzzles that require strategic thinking. Experience the thrill of completing levels and watch as your score increases with every match. Enjoy!
hits.Instructions:
Match 3 or more pieces in a line to explode them.
Match 4 pieces to create the Rocket. The Rocket blows up the whole line!
Match 4 pieces to form a square to create the Spinner. The Spinner destroys one of the targets!
Make a T-shaped match of 5 pieces to create the Bomb. The Bomb makes a massive explosion on the board!
Match 5 pieces in a line to create the Rainbow Flower. The Rainbow Flower explodes pieces of the same color!

hits.Instructions: The goal of Dream Pet Link 2 is to clear the entire play area before the timer runs out. Find and click the identical tiles on the board to clear them from play. However, tiles can only be matched together by a line with three or less corners.

hits.Title: Tile Guru Match Fun
hits.Description:

hits.Instructions:
1) Launch the game. Tiles appear on the screen.
2) Find and tap three identical, open tiles.
3) Identical tiles vanish in sets of three.
4) Continue until the board is clear.
5) Use Hints/Power-ups if stuck.
6) Complete levels by matching all the tiles.

hits.Instructions: Play Bubble Shooter Free by aiming and shooting colorful bubbles at the cluster hanging from the ceiling. Match three of the same kind to pop them. hits.Title: 11x11 BLOXX
hits.Description: 11+11 Bloxx," also known as "11x11 Blocks," is a captivating block-puzzle game that distinguishes itself by employing an 11x11 game board instead of the traditional 10x10 grid. In this game, your objective is to strategically position multi-colored polyomino shapes onto the board to accumulate coins and points by forming rows and columns comprised of precisely 11 blocks.
hits.Instructions: Assess the three distinct shapes at your disposal. Strategize the initial placement for one of them. Relocate the remaining two shapes accordingly. Evaluate the upcoming set of shapes and position them to create partial lines. Execute skillful combination moves, aligning multiple lines simultaneously. Aim to maximize your earnings in terms of coins and points.
hits.Key Features:
The game board showcases a captivating arrangement of dark, purplish-blue blocks, forming an intricate checkerboard pattern. Unlike many other 10x10 puzzle games, "11+11 Bloxx" introduces a unique element by presenting various patterns across 12 distinct levels. Some of these patterns incorporate blocks resembling immovable stones, which pose a challenge as they obstruct the creation of 11-block lines. Nonetheless, the game compensates by awarding you coins and points for eliminating smaller lines in these scenarios.

Progressing in the game requires you to conquer one level to unlock the next. While it's possible to remove lines one at a time, opting for combination moves to clear multiple lines simultaneously earns you higher point rewards.

11+11 Bloxx" enriches the block-puzzle experience with several enhancements. The coins you earn can be wisely invested in power-ups, extending your gameplay by increasing available space on the board. These power-ups grant you the ability to swap two blocks, eliminate individual blocks, clear groups of blocks by type, or remove a specified quantity of blocks. The game introduces these power-up options when you run out of moves, or you can access and purchase them using the lightning bolt button.

Furthermore, your accumulated coins unlock the option to acquire diverse block types, including round blocks, blocks adorned with stripes, and flat tiles. This diversity in block types adds an additional layer of strategic depth to your gameplay.

hits.Instructions: There are four open Foundations and four Free Cells above the Tableau piles. The Cells work as an intermediate place for sorting cards. The objective is to build up all cards on Foundations from Ace to King by following suit. You can only move one card at a time! Only the top cards of the Tableau piles and cards from Cells are available to play. Each Cell may contain only one card. The cards in the Cells can be moved to the Foundation piles or back to the Tableau piles.

hits.Title: Mahjong 3D Connect
hits.Description: Have you ever thought about what would it be like to play your favourite classic mahjong game in 3D? Mahjong 3D Connect is exactly that! It takes the classic mahjong connect gameplay into the third dimension! So what are you waiting for? Play Mahjong 3D Connect now and solve the puzzle!
hits.Instructions: The rules are simple: find and match two tiles with the same symbol. Tiles are matchable only if they are not blocked by other tiles. hits.Title: FamilyNest: Tile Match Puzzle
hits.Description:
Welcome to our addictive, relaxing, and free-to-play Tile Connect puzzle & pair matching game!

As a classic pair matching puzzle inspired by Mahjong, Tile Connect is a popular strategy game in which you need to find the matching pairs of identical images and leave the board empty. Your goal is to connect all pairs and crush all tiles in the game field.

If you are a matching game lover and looking for an excellent tile puzzle to exercise your thinking and memory, you will definitely be addicted to this FREE and newest Tile Connect mind puzzle! Tile Connect - Tile Match Game is well designed to develop your logical thinking and practice your tile craft for free. This will be the perfect time killer for you!
hits.Instructions:
?HOW TO PLAY?
- Tap on the first tile to select it and look for another one with the same image.
- Connect two same tiles with no more than 3 straight lines.
- After the connection, the matching pairs of tiles will disappear from the puzzle board.
- Match all tiles in pairs to clear the board and collect as many stars as you can!
- Take advantage of hints when you get stuck and use shuffle to rearrange all tiles to build paths more easily.
hits.Key Features:
? MAJOR GAME FEATURES?
✓ Brain-training pair matching game for all ages?
✓ Absolutely FREE to enjoy anytime and anywhere?
✓ Simple & fun matching game mechanics and rules?
✓ Tons of challenging Tile Connect levels to unlock?
✓ Clear UI and beautiful tile collections with uniquely designed graphics?
✓ A great variety of patterns and themes to choose?
✓ EASY & flexible to control and connect onet tiles?️
✓ Relaxing tile puzzle without time limit?
✓ Use helpful boosters to overcome the difficulty faster?

hits.Title: Cozy Merge
hits.Description:
Cozy Merge is a nice puzzle game where you merge tiles on a board to reach one million points. Each tile has a number that doubles when merged with identical tiles. Keep placing identical tiles together to create new ones with different numbers and colors.

The game has pleasant music, design and sounds that immerse you in the experience. If you get stuck, use boosters like undo, shuffle, or doubling tiles to solve the puzzle.

Cozy Merge is easy to learn and hard to master.
hits.Instructions:
You have a field on which you need to place tiles with numbers. Place tiles with the same number next to each other to get one tile with the final number multiplied by two. As a result, you need to reach one million.

If you suddenly get stuck, then use powerful boosters: undo last move, shuffle all the tiles on the field and multiplying any tile by two.
hits.Key Features:
- Merge tiles on the field to get the maximum score and reach one million
- Each tile has its own number, which doubles when merged with tiles of the same value
- Boosters: undo, shuffle or double tiles

- Easy to learn and hard to master

Grow new crops such as Gooseberry, Foxgloves, Celery, Papyrus, Loquat, Prickly Pears, Berseem, and Blackberries. Enjoy stunning visuals and engaging gameplay in this delightful solitaire adventure!
hits.Instructions: Move cards one point higher or lower than the discard stack, clearing cards to reveal new ones. If stuck, draw from the spare stack. Between levels, manage your farm: plant crops, harvest for coins, unlock features, complete daily missions, spin the Wheel of Fortune, and customize your farmhouse. Return daily for rewards!

hits.Title: Idle Merge Car And Race
hits.Description:
An addictive idle car merging game. Build your own car racing company and grow your business.
Move your cars to the racing track and earn money every time they cross the finish line. Buy new cars (or collect them from the gift boxes), and merge the same level cars to upgrade into a new type. The better the cars, the more money you will earn. Use your earnings to buy upgrade packages in the Shop to help you make money faster! Become the richest in the world in this idle merge car game.
hits.Instructions:
Tap and drag to move your cars to the racing track and earn money every time they cross the finish line.
Tap on the car at the parking slot to move it back.
Drag and drop a car on another one (of the same type) to merge them into a new/upgraded type.
You can buy more parking slots and additional tracks in the Shop.
hits.Key Features:
- An addictive game for all ages
- 30 types of cool planes are waiting for you to collect
- Upgrade packages in Shop
- Turbo mode
- Idle earnings
- Daily rewards

hits.Title: Kitchen Star
hits.Description: Introducing "Kitchen Star," the ultimate puzzle challenge for visual thinkers! In this captivating game, players are tasked with unraveling intricate images by strategically rotating connected chunks of lines. Your mission? Get ready to sharpen your spatial skills and become the ultimate Kitchen Star!
hits.Instructions: In each level, an image has been scrambled. Rotate the pieces by pressing the rotation buttons until the image is right again. The fewer moves you use, the better your score!

hits.Instructions: Use your mouse or touchpad to drag items between shelves. Match 3 identical items on one shelf to clear it and let upper shelves slide down. Clear entire stacks to shift adjacent shelves. Collect all items before time runs out!

hits.Title: Puzzle lub
hits.Description: In this puzzle game you need to connect the pieces in a line. To successfully complete the game, use its mechanics to your advantage.
hits.Instructions:
